Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Makes majority of decisions for own and/or direct reports' work.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Escalates decisions to senior Leadership when appropriate.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Impact or value-add is primarily due to management of staff (including contract workers) and/or key processes.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Role has transitioned from individual contributor to supervisor in the form of one or both of the following:

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Managing people (at least 1 direct report)

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Oversight of indirect reports and/or day-to-day management of contractors vendor partners etc.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Owning key processes or service offerings.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Effectively prioritizes and delegates tasks across multiple projects allocating time and resources to successfully produce high quality deliverables on-time.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Proactively contributes to team’s success by sharing past experiences to support best practices.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Leverages acquired knowledge to support individual goals and develop others.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Reviews team’s work products and provides timely positive and constructive feedback.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Coaches the team to resolve their conflicts constructively and promptly so they do not escalate.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Effectively tailors communication style to different audiences.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Demonstrates ability to rise above the details by communicating the big picture.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Possesses deep technical knowledge in at least one area of specialization or expertise.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Gathers masters shares and applies technical and industry best practices.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Takes accountability for the achievement of own and/or team stretch goals.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Ensures cascaded department objectives align to team’s priorities and own/direct reports’ goals.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Ensures direct reports and internal and external stakeholders understand ConfidentialCompany’s values and policies and adhere to them.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Builds and maintains strong relationships with key internal and external stakeholders.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Serves as strong contributor to cross-functional/team initiatives.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Helps peers on other teams even though there may not be a tangible personal benefit.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Drives an agile mindset by working with the team to continuously automate streamline and improve processes.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Uses voice to share views and perspectives while maintaining professional relationships.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Demonstrates creativity in accessing and leveraging resources to accurately and fully answer questions and propose solutions.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Applies trainings and takes intentional actions to mitigate unconscious bias in decision making and how we engage with people.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Builds a professional internal network comprised of those with different backgrounds and experiences.

Title: MANAGER/ASSOCIATE
Expectations: Advocates when there is an opportunity for the team to exhibit more inclusive behaviors.
